StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllWaiverCodes]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT W.WAIVER_ID, C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, T.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, L.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE, C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC, T.WAIVER_TYPE_DESC, L.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC FROM WAIVER W WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN WAIVER_CATEGORY C ON (W.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID AND C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE IN ('D', 'F')) INNER JOIN WAIVER_TYPE T ON W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_LEVEL L ON W.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = L.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID ORDER BY WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE, W.WAIVER_ID
